Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.opentcs.data.model.visualization.ModelLayoutElement.ObjectNameComparator
    Use comparators provided by Comparators instead.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.opentcs.data.order.TransportOrder.ageComparator
    Use comparators provided by Comparators instead.
    org.opentcs.data.TCSObject.idComparator
    Use comparators provided by Comparators instead.
    org.opentcs.data.TCSObject.nameComparator
    Use comparators provided by Comparators instead.
    org.opentcs.data.order.TransportOrder.priorityComparator
    Use comparators provided by Comparators instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.opentcs.util.FileSystems.copyFile(File, File, boolean)
    Scheduled for removal with release 4.0.0. Use Files.copy() from the Guava library instead.
    org.opentcs.util.communication.RMIRegistries.getOrCreateWorkingRegistry()
    Scheduled for removal with release 4.0.0. Use lookupOrInstallRegistry() instead.
    org.opentcs.util.communication.RMIRegistries.getOrCreateWorkingRegistry(int)
    Scheduled for removal with release 4.0.0. Use lookupOrInstallRegistry(int) instead.
    org.opentcs.access.LocalKernel.getScheduler()
    Scheduled for removal with release 4.0.0. Let the scheduler instance be injected instead.
    org.opentcs.drivers.MovementCommand.getStepIndex()
    Scheduled for removal with release 4.0.0. Use getStep().getRouteIndex() instead.
    org.opentcs.util.communication.RMIRegistries.getWorkingRegistry(String, int)
    Scheduled for removal with release 4.0.0. Use lookupRegistry(String, int) instead.
    org.opentcs.drivers.BasicCommunicationAdapter.isVehicleAlive()
    Scheduled for removal with release 4.0.0. Not really used anywhere, and has always been semantically equivalent to isVehicleConnected().
    org.opentcs.drivers.VehicleModel.isVehicleAlive()
    Scheduled for removal with release 4.0.0. Not called anywhere.
    org.opentcs.algorithms.Dispatcher.withdrawOrder(Vehicle, boolean)
    Scheduled for removal with release 4.0.0. Call/implement Dispatcher.withdrawOrder(org.opentcs.data.model.Vehicle, boolean, boolean) instead.
    org.opentcs.access.Kernel.withdrawTransportOrder(TCSObjectReference<TransportOrder>, boolean)
    Call Kernel.withdrawTransportOrder(org.opentcs.data.TCSObjectReference, boolean, boolean) instead. Scheduled for removal with release 4.0.0.
    org.opentcs.access.Kernel.withdrawTransportOrderByVehicle(TCSObjectReference<Vehicle>, boolean)
    Call Kernel.withdrawTransportOrderByVehicle(org.opentcs.data.TCSObjectReference, boolean, boolean) instead. Scheduled for removal with release 4.0.0.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.opentcs.data.order.TransportOrder(int, String, List<DriveOrder.Destination>)
    Will be removed with release 4.0.0. Use other constructor instead.
